expected_answer: A driver must carry a valid driving licence, Registration Certificate (RC), insurance certificate, and Pollution Under Control (PUC) certificate. Digital versions stored in approved repositories like DigiLocker are also valid.
Drunk driving attracts a fine up to ?10,000 and possible imprisonment. A BAC above 0.03%% is illegal. Repeat offences or aggravated cases may lead to licence suspension or higher penalties.
